Name: My Jigsaw Adventures - Forgotten Destiny
About the game: Get ready for an amazing journey made of jigsaws, driven by a fantastic story! Forgotten Destiny is the fourth episode of the My Jigsaw Adventures series (MJA)! Every game from the series is independent; gets its own universe and story, that you will unfold step by step upon jigsaw completion. Story: Dragons and humans are in peace, living with a minimum of interactions. You have been requested to recover an item from old ruins on the dragons territory. Fate or not, the consequences of such act couldn't have been imagined... A beautiful story-driven jigsaw game made of 45 puzzles. Hand-painted pictures by a professional artist - no photo stock Three different game modes: Story - Blitz - Challenge Choose among a selection of shapes: traditional jigsaw, mosaic or arrow. Five different sizes of puzzle (from 28 to 1000 pieces). Set your own difficulty level thanks to customization settings (choose to display the picture or no, display the grid, etc.). Adapt the puzzle to your needs by changing the color of the background, pieces outline or even the color of the cursor. Original sound track made for the story. Download the puzzles you completed as wallpaper for your computer. Included in My Jigsaw Adventures Collection :
